CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction solar cells fabricated by using PzNDTDTBT or PzNDTDTBO as electron donor and PC71BM as acceptor show a power conversion efficiency of 3.22% and 5.07% , respectively , under illumination of AM1.5G , 100 mW cm^-2 .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| PC71BM |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names, as they refer to specific substances used in the fabrication of the bulk heterojunction solar cells.
